protocol.name: P-GSE22983-2
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized and plated on 1/2 MS plates supplemented with 1% sucrose and grown 4 days at 21oC under the dark.

protocol.name: P-GSE22983-3
protocol.text: Pine Tree Method as described in Chang et al, Plant J 54, 205 (2008) (PMID 18182030).

protocol.name: P-GSE22983-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 701021 Rev. 5, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE22983-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16.5 hr at 45C on the GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE22983-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.

protocol.name: P-GSE22983-7
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
